entry.title: https://github.com/Dao-AILab/causal-conv1d
entry.content: Causal depthwise conv1d in CUDA, with a PyTorch interface

entry.title: https://github.com/Liu-xiandong/How_to_optimize_in_GPU
entry.content: This is a series of GPU optimization topics. Here we will introduce how to optimize the CUDA kernel in detail. I will introduce several basic kernel optimizations, including: elementwise, reduce, sgemv, sgemm, etc. The performance of these kernels is basically at or near the theoretical limit.

entry.title: https://github.com/rapidsai/raft
entry.content: RAFT contains fundamental widely-used algorithms and primitives for machine learning and information retrieval. The algorithms are CUDA-accelerated and form building blocks for more easily writing high performance applications.
